description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Race through the sea while avoiding obstacles and your opponents. Collect powerups to give youself that extra edge. The last fish swimming wins! 2 - 4 players
description.short: Race through the sea while avoiding obstacles and your opponents. Collect powerups to give youself that extra edge. The last fish swimming wins! 2 - 4 players
